definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: The main rotary shaft can be simultaneously fixed with a plurality of circular discs with self rotation shafts.
sentences.chinese: 主转轴上可同时固定多个带自转轴的圆盘。

sentences.english: Each of the nine planets turns on its own axis.They all go around the sun the same way.
sentences.chinese: 九大行星都自转，它们又都围着太阳按同一方向转动。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the rotation of the earth is another factor responsible for earth plate motion.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，自转的影响也是使板块运动的力源。

sentences.english: The earth rotates in counterclockwise direction or from west to east.
sentences.chinese: 地球按照逆时针方向或者由西向东自转。

sentences.english: The magnetic field should act as a strong brake on a magnetar's rotation.
sentences.chinese: 磁场对超强磁星体的自转应该是一种强力的煞车。

sentences.english: The North Pole is the spot on Earth’s globe that marks the northern end of an imaginary stick Earth spins around.
sentences.chinese: 北极是地球表面与假想的自转轴相交的北交点。

sentences.english: Clutch and overspeed provision during autorotation .
sentences.chinese: 离合器和超速期间提供自转。

sentences.english: But it turns once on its axis in 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 但是它绕着自转轴运转一周需要24小时。

sentences.english: Deciding when to introduce a leap second is the responsibility of the International Earth Rotation and Reference Systems Service.
sentences.chinese: 国际地球自转服务组织负责决定何时加减闰秒。

sentences.english: LiBiao resolution with SanYing privately turned to kill leopards ditch LinZhenHai.
sentences.chinese: 李彪决议带着三营私自转到豹子沟杀掉林振海。

sentences.english: The earth spins round once every twenty-four hours.
sentences.chinese: 地球每二十四小时自转一周。

sentences.english: A person who lives at the Equator is in accelerated motion due to the earth's rotation.
sentences.chinese: 住在赤道的人由于地球自转的缘故做加速运动。

sentences.english: The earth spins around on its axis as it travels around the sun.
sentences.chinese: 地球绕地轴自转的方向和它绕太阳公转的一样。

sentences.english: The rapid rotation, the shape becomes very flat.
sentences.chinese: 由于快速自转，形状变得很扁。

sentences.english: And we pass both high tides during each twenty-four-hour rotation of the earth on its axis.
sentences.chinese: 地球自转24小时期间，我们就会经历两次的涨潮。

sentences.english: Adopt the eccentric revolution and rotation principle and stepless timing.
sentences.chinese: 采用偏心式工转自转原理和无级调速。

definition: to rotate about an axis/axis of rotation (math.)
perihelion, the nearest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/lower apsis
aphelion, the furthest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/opposite: perihelion 近日點|近日点[jin4 ri4 dian3]/higher apsis
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
